website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for a bigger lamp set, this is a great choice.
pros: For the cost, this lamp set is a great option
The set includes a floor lamp and three table lamps, all with a charming brass finish
This set will have you covered to add light to an entire room
cons: The shades are more beige than white, and the thick fabric blocks a lot of light

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in the shade color
customer_reviews.text: Very very disappointed with the shade. Good price for the package of lamps but not the quality I was looking for. If they had white shades I would have given them a 4 star
customer_reviews.author: CYNTHIA A WHITE

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality - total waste of money.  Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.text: These lamps look NOTHING like the photos. It is a real case of Bait and Switch. The shades are not white rather are a faded cream and wrinkled. The seams are not aligned and so tense that they could easily come apart. In order to ship it back, I would be responsible for shipping despite that this is nothing like the photos and info that the Seller provided. Beyond disappointed!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: liv4jc

customer_reviews.title: I love these lamps
customer_reviews.text: I love these lamps. They were exactly what I was looking for and the price was right. I was very disappointed however in the color of the lampshades. They are advertised as cream colored shades and the picture shows white shades when they are really a very drab and deep beige. I had to spend more money to buy the color shades thought I was ordering. I didn't want to return the whole set because I like the lamps and they were exactly what I was looking for.The color of the shades are poorly represented. In the product details section it should be mentioned the shades are beige.
customer_reviews.author: James Cahill

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying Ashley Furniture and accessories for years and these lamps are a huge disappointment. There are dings and small scratches over each lamp. Only 1 lampshade fits properly and all the lampshades are slightly crooked because of the metal bars being slightly bent. Keep scrolling. Don't buy these lamps.
customer_reviews.author: LF

customer_reviews.title: it's pretty easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: the color of the lamp is completely different from what is advertised. The lamp cloth is a creamish dark beige and the metal is gold colored (the advertisement shows a whitish/ivory lamp cloth with dark metal). when you rotate the little switch to turn on the light, the first notch produces a spark and does not turn the light on. you'll have to turn rotate the switch two times to get it to turn on and off every time. aside from this, it's pretty easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Elegant look in a very inexpensive item
customer_reviews.text: Lamps are a lovely accessory to our Ashley furniture suite. The lampshades were a bit difficult to assemble, but the end product looks good. The lamps themselves seem a bit flimsy, but have the weight and appearance of solid metal. The floor lamp is shorter than expected (about 5') but adequate. Really pleased with the three stage lighting. Overall a very good value.
customer_reviews.author: Frosini Georges

customer_reviews.title: These lamps are absolutely gorgeous and I love the fact that all are 3 way (except the ...
customer_reviews.text: These lamps are absolutely gorgeous and I love the fact that all are 3 way (except the smaller one). It's unbelievable you get such quality at this price. I had trouble putting on the shades though but, fortunately, I had a worker here doing other chores so he assembled them for me in under 5 minutes (guess my hands were too weak). If I ever need lamps again, this is the place I'll be ordering from. The shades are not white as depicted in the pictures but a very light beige. Fine with me because they still look elegant.
customer_reviews.author: D. Bazinett

customer_reviews.title: i actually feel like these lamps might be VERY dangerous if left on ...
customer_reviews.text: first off the shades are nowhere near white! and they are supposed to be 3-way switches NOT!!!! they actually blew 2 brand new 3-way bulbs!! i actually feel like these lamps might be VERY dangerous if left on at home. 1 of the lamps got INSANELY bright then blew.
customer_reviews.author: looneytunes

customer_reviews.title: Can beat the price and appearance for 4 lamps!
customer_reviews.text: These are easy to assemble and look nice. They are a bit on the lower quality side, as to be expected from the price point, but once assembled, that fact is not obvious. Look great in my living room! Perfect for my temporary apartment where I wanted inexpensive stuff (since my permanent home has everything I need already) that still maintained a classy appearance.
customer_reviews.author: KEO

customer_reviews.title: Great set of lamps coming in 3 different sizes
customer_reviews.text: Great set of lamps coming in 3 different sizes. Color is as advertised on both the shade and body of the lamp. I use the LED programmable lights with these lamps and they work just great. Decent price and came well packaged. There is assembly needed and it doesn't take too long to get them put together and up and running.
customer_reviews.author: Steve S

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking lamps
customer_reviews.text: These lamps throw great reading light in a large room.. The antique brass is a little lighter than I had in mind but will darken over time. I was surprised when they arrived in one box and needed to be put together including the lampshades. Easy to do and pieces well marked. Great value as I've been pricing lamps and shades for quite som time.
customer_reviews.author: emurph17

customer_reviews.title: They look beautiful and worked great for about a month
customer_reviews.text: They look beautiful and worked great for about a month. The floor lamp has developed a short in it, and one of the end table lamps now only has one setting instead of the 3 way dimmer. Very disappointed. I will end up fixing the short in the one and replacing the 3 switch in the other. On a side note, they are labeled as traditional copper, they are more of a brushed bronze. I wouldn't buy these again just because of the poor quality of the electrical work.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Reinert

customer_reviews.title: Shades are NOT white as shown (why I ordered this ...
customer_reviews.text: Shades are NOT white as shown (why I ordered this item), they're a dingy looking beige. The base is lighter than expected, and it took quite a while (for us anyway) to figure out putting the shades together. Won't return as I'm not in the mood for it, will probably look for something else later on.
customer_reviews.author: rusti_1

customer_reviews.title: Strong hands needed to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: These look very nice but are hard to assemble if you don't have strong hands. The lampshades are flat so the hard part is putting in the metal doodads to stretch them out. The last one (there are three for each shade) is wicked hard - my fingers were red and sore for days. I learned to tuck one corner under the nub and bend out the arm in the middle to get the other corner tucked under the second nub. Once complete they look good and work well.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Classy lamps-slow delivery.
customer_reviews.text: These lamps finally arrived. Very long shipping time but it was disclosed at the time of purchase. The lamps are of very good quality and classy appearance. The hardest part of assembling them was putting the supports inside the fabric shades. You need strong hands to do it. I would purchase from this vendor again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wilbur

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty, very heavy
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty, very heavy. Nice color fabric. The only thing I don't like about them is the fabric on the shades wants to uncurl at the top. It is glued on somehow and seems not to want to hold real well, although it is not coming unglued on all of them. For the price, it is a good value. If you don't want to spend a lot of money, these are good.
customer_reviews.author: Mardee Heinrich

customer_reviews.title: Great Package Deal
customer_reviews.text: Great matching set. Did not realize I wouldn't have enough space for 4 lamps though. They are pretty good quality too. You have to make few minor adjustments but other than that, they work perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Stamaris

customer_reviews.title: Absolute worst purchase!  Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: These are the absolute worst things I've ever purchased. Once assembled (which is not clear when purchasing) the lamps were so floppy they leaned which ever wY the wind blew. Even worse is you need to request a refund. I purchase everything I can on Amazon and never have experienced this. Save yourself the hassle of returning them and just don't order.
customer_reviews.author: Candice Arcari

customer_reviews.title: A gentle light alternative.
customer_reviews.text: I feel i should have paid a little more for this set. Of course the shades came wrinkled (due to the packaging) but that straightens out once one assembles them. I needed some lamps instead of always using the ceiling lights and this set makes the rooms look very cozy and provide the perfect amount of light for reading or viewing almost anything else. Just one thing though: The shades are beige and not white as seen in the product's picture (maybe it is just my eyes) but they look perfect so I really don't mind. I can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: Juan A. Henriquez

customer_reviews.title: These lamps are very nicely made, attractive and fairly easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: These lamps are very nicely made, attractive and fairly easy to assemble. I really felt that I rec'd a quality product.nk that price U
customer_reviews.author: Linda G. Farris

customer_reviews.title: Product description not accurate.Seller won't pay return shipping
customer_reviews.text: The lamp shades are not white. They are more of a tan. The lamps are much lighter brown than the photo. I had to return these lamps, as they do not go with my decor and are not what I wanted. The package is very heavy, and the seller won't pay for return shipping. I paid a lot for lamps I am not keeping.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer H.

customer_reviews.title: The box wasn't very big....was suprised
customer_reviews.text: the lamp came in one box...and was put together easily, the look great...very pleased with them
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Great lamps!
customer_reviews.text: These are great lamps. High quality and a lot of lamps for a great cost. The shades are a pretty light beige color. The lamps are pretty, well made and my husband assembled them with ease. I would recommend to my friends for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa R

customer_reviews.title: Don't be fooled by bad reviews!
customer_reviews.text: These are great ! A few wrinkles in the shades but not nearly bleh at some of the bad reviews claimed. I would buy them again!
customer_reviews.author: Brett Swope

customer_reviews.title: Lovely lamps
customer_reviews.text: These lamps are very nice, just make sure you get the three-way bulbs. I tried putting regular CFLs in at first, but it didn't produce enough light. I then got the three-way bulbs and I'm much happier. They produce much more light now.
customer_reviews.author: Ariana

customer_reviews.title: Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Bang for the buck! Very pleased with my purchase! :)
customer_reviews.author: Heather Hallert

customer_reviews.title: 4 very nice lamps for the price
customer_reviews.text: 4 very nice lamps for the price! Came in such a small box, I thought there was no way these could be nice. Lampshades were folded down flat but shaped up very nice once out of the box. Definately pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: mary e. smith

customer_reviews.title: Love these lamps!
customer_reviews.text: They are perfect. Just as the description said. Easy assembly. Very nice for the overall look we were going for.
customer_reviews.author: Hankinson

customer_reviews.title: Love these lamps one of every size
customer_reviews.text: Love these lamps one of every size. Not to big not to small just right and the great thing is the cords are long enough so you sit you lamp just about any place. Really easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Janey

customer_reviews.title: they look great! And the extra light is much appreciated
customer_reviews.text: I bought these lamps to match the hardware on my living room furniture, they look great! And the extra light is much appreciated, my living room is very large with 9 ft ceilings.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel M Bounds

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Small lamp shade has begun unraveling at the top after less than a month of use.
customer_reviews.author: tracie s

customer_reviews.title: Nice lamps, not top quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice lamps, not top quality, but they are easy to assemble and they work. Now to see how long the last. 4th star is for the easy assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Bo

customer_reviews.title: Very nice lamp set
customer_reviews.text: Very nice lamp set. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars was because the shades were a bear to put together.Nice lamps
customer_reviews.author: Cashyboo27

customer_reviews.title: Love the set
customer_reviews.text: Puttingbthose metal supports in the shades was painful but overall freat set!
customer_reviews.author: kis2189

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: love them lamp shades were not glued well but still could use them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and heavy set of lamps
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and heavy set of lamps. I'm very happy with them. The shades are a darker buff and the stands are a lighter bronze than what the picture shows.
customer_reviews.author: Monks

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, easy to assemble, great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: viva sandrock

customer_reviews.title: Shades Had to put the shades together The metal supports ...
customer_reviews.text: Shades Had to put the shades together The metal supports did not fit the shade very well
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Deceiving pictures
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was fast and the lamps looks good, but I'm not happy with the shades. The pictures show white / off-white while I received a beige color (see my picture). The shades are also thick, therefore a 150 watt light bulb will not brighten up the room. It's false advertising to post white shades and deliver beige! Update 10/17: There are witing issuss with my lamps. Sometimes the light would flicker when you touch the switch. Sometimes the light wouldn’t turn on even though the bulb is on tight and you have to wiggle the switch. Quality is not great!
customer_reviews.author: M.McFly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: All lamps worked as advertised. There were no missing parts.
customer_reviews.author: GI

customer_reviews.title: Great Lamps
customer_reviews.text: These are great...fit beautifully into our 1923 Craftsman. Easy to put together, and live up to the other good reviews.
customer_reviews.author: yaya_lv

customer_reviews.title: Figure on replacing lamps shades in a few months
customer_reviews.text: The lamp shades come collapsed...Put them together and been about three weeks and they are falling apart..Lamps are okay
customer_reviews.author: jack the ripper

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful lamps. Shipping took a while, but it was worth the wait.
customer_reviews.author: sszzz

customer_reviews.title: Look nice.
customer_reviews.text: Look nice, but assembly is time consuming. Lamp shades are difficult to attach.
customer_reviews.author: TTodd

customer_reviews.title: The lamps are great, but the shades were misrepresented
customer_reviews.text: The lamps are great, but the shades were misrepresented. The ad shows white shades, they were tan! We had to purchase white shades at almost the same cost as the lamps. Our inquiry to the vendor was with the fact that we were out of luck.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. George S. Burbidge

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value! Lamps are very pretty once assembled and ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value! Lamps are very pretty once assembled and placed in your room. Will match any decor.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki M. Sebesta

customer_reviews.title: They were fairly easy to assemble and made a quick positive difference in ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow! What a deal these were. They were fairly easy to assemble and made a quick positive difference in the large room we have them in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: This is value for money, I am 100% satisfied. Superb look and satisfactory light it produce. I strongly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: MyChoice

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful lamps
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble the base, but for the shades it takes more time. Beautiful lamps.
customer_reviews.author: droman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: beautiful finish on lamps and beige lamp shades add a lot to their elegance
customer_reviews.author: linda johnson

customer_reviews.title: I like the option of having the different sizes
customer_reviews.text: Actually nicer than I thought they would be. I like the option of having the different sizes. The other thing I like is I can change the shades.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda K Coffman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Thought I already wrote this review, but to keep it short, fab and classy!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff J

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for the price. Not what I would call copper! More of antique brass. But used them in a different room and got different lamps for the room these were supposed to go in. All in all happy !
customer_reviews.author: rebecca r. kelley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! I am so glad I ordered these. They are perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: beautiful lamps
customer_reviews.text: a beautiful addition to our house. they came, very well packed and were fairly easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love them...they're beautiful and functional. Love that they have three way switches...
customer_reviews.author: Irene Rutherford

customer_reviews.title: Built good.. heavy duty electrical cords
customer_reviews.text: Built good..heavy duty electrical cords. Color not really what I wanted, but they wil work well
customer_reviews.author: dahank

customer_reviews.title: DONT TRUST THE IMAGES!
customer_reviews.text: Shades are TAN....not cream, Antique metal looks dirty. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: iTech

customer_reviews.title: Great collection
customer_reviews.text: These lamps work great in my den and with the 4 piece set even had extra for another room. They are exactly as shown and work great. Very good quality for the price!
customer_reviews.author: T. Beacham

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Lamps were very unsteady. Lamp shades were folded so when I took them out they were very wrinkly and one we as dirty. I had to pay $ to ship them back and it took them 3 weeks to refund my money. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Nadya Taylor

customer_reviews.title: I like the rustic look of these lamps
customer_reviews.text: I like the rustic look of these lamps. The variety in sizes are also a plus. It just so happens that the lamps' shades match my bedroom curtains. The shade are a creamy tan (I couldn't really tell that from the photo - they looked more white than anything else to me).
customer_reviews.author: W. Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Great touch to living room and accent lamp in office
customer_reviews.text: Could not believe the size box these were shipped in...very small. I was able to assemble all of them in less than 10 minutes. Great touch to living room and accent lamp in office.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Wilson

product_meta.title: Signature Design by Ashley - Caron Collection Lamp Set - Set of 4 - Floor, Accent & 2 Table Lamps - Brass Finish
product_meta.description: This antique brass finished metal lamp group features 1 accent lamp, 2 table lamps and 1 floor lamp with creamy fabric bell shades. Table and floor lamps feature 3-way switches and the accent lamp features an on/off switch.
feature_bullets: METAL LAMP SET: Accentuate bedrooms and night stands instantly with this traditional-style set. Creamy bell shades illuminate with a well-lit glow that's perfect by a desk or modern study
BEAUTIFULLY CRAFTED: Made of metal with fabric shade. Table and floor lamps use 1 type A bulb each (not included) with 150-watt max or CFL 25-watt max. Accent lamp has 60-watt max or CFL 13-watt max
VERSATILE STYLE: The antique finish on these lamps make them ideal to accessorize with a wide range of decor styles. Use them in a bedroom, living room or office to harmonize your space
SET OF 4: Includes floor, accent and 2 table lamps. Floor lamp measures 15.25" W x 15.25" D x 60" H, accent lamp measures 11" W x 11" D x 19.75" H, and table lamps measure 15.25" W x 15.25" D x 27" H
ASSEMBLY REQUIRED: Easy-to-follow instructions, tools and hardware included to set shade support and assemble pieces. UL listed
DIRECT FROM THE MANUFACTURER: Ashley Furniture goes the extra mile to package, protect and deliver your purchase in a timely manner
BUY WITH CONFIDENCE: Designed and manufactured by Ashley Furniture Industries. The trusted source for stylish furniture, lighting, rugs, accessories and mattresses. For every taste and budget
4 Piece Set - 2 table lamps and 1 floor lamp
Table and floor lamps feature 3-way switches

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars101 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
